Teaching Talk: Helping Students Who Procrastinate (Tim Pychyl)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mhFQA998WiA

What is procrastination (not)?
	to put off or postpone to another day
	need to distinguish between procrastination and delay
	gap between intention and action

old, dying people really regret procrastination

procrastinators aren't worse at tracking time or calendar event scheduling

fighting procrastination leads to upwards spiral
	person feels more in control, more accomplished




https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=arj7oStGLkU
Inside the mind of a master procrastinator | Tim Urban

two types of procrastination
	1. deadline kicks in - usually self corrects
	2. no deadline e.g. starting company, maintaining health
no deadlines are more insidious because instant gratification monkey never chased out

one way to counter is to use long-term calendar chart to keep passage of time in persepctive
